answers.answer:
A specialty doctor in a basic package offers medical services for emergency situations, acute conditions, chronic diseases, and diseases with endemic-epidemic potential. It also includes family planning services, palliative care, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy surveillance, and medical services for diagnostic purposes, including day hospitalization.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "Specialist consultation", specifically the paragraph that starts with "The basic package contains the following services offered by the specialty doctor:".
answers.bResponse:
A specialty doctor in a basic package offers medical services for emergency situations, acute conditions, chronic diseases, and diseases with endemic-epidemic potential. It also includes family planning services, palliative care, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy surveillance, and medical services for diagnostic purposes, including day hospitalization.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "Specialist consultation", specifically the paragraph that starts with "The basic package contains the following services offered by the specialty doctor:". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Specialized ambulatory medical assistance can be obtained in medical practices, health units, specialized and integrated outpatient clinics within hospitals, diagnostic and treatment medical centers, and palliative care clinics, provided they are contracted by the health insurance company.

To find this detailed information, please go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the content under the "Specialist consultation" section.
answers.bResponse:
Specialized ambulatory medical assistance can be obtained in medical practices, health units, specialized and integrated outpatient clinics within hospitals, diagnostic and treatment medical centers, and palliative care clinics, provided they are contracted by the health insurance company.

To find this detailed information, please go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the content under the "Specialist consultation" section. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Yes, people from the war zones of Ukraine can access specialist consultations without needing a referral ticket or a prescription from a family doctor.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the "Specialist consultation" section.
answers.bResponse:
Yes, people from the war zones of Ukraine can access specialist consultations without needing a referral ticket or a prescription from a family doctor.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the "Specialist consultation" section. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Patients with chronic conditions are permitted a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter.

To find this information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor` and read under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that begins with "Patients with chronic conditions benefit from a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter...".
answers.bResponse:
Patients with chronic conditions are permitted a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter.

To find this information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor` and read under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that begins with "Patients with chronic conditions benefit from a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter...". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Yes, medical consultations for chronic conditions can be conducted remotely using any means of communication. A referral ticket from a family doctor or other specialist is not mandatory for these remote consultations.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that discusses "Consultations for chronic conditions."
answers.bResponse:
Yes, medical consultations for chronic conditions can be conducted remotely using any means of communication. A referral ticket from a family doctor or other specialist is not mandatory for these remote consultations.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that discusses "Consultations for chronic conditions." For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Yes, insured individuals can receive up to two free follow-up consultations after a hospital stay if they have a confirmed diagnosis upon discharge. These consultations cover tracking treatment evolution, performing therapeutic procedures, wound/cast care after surgical/orthopedic interventions, and recommendations for necessary investigations.

You can find this detailed information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that begins with "For those insured who have a confirmed diagnosis upon leaving the hospital...".
answers.bResponse:

These consultations cover tracking treatment evolution, performing therapeutic procedures, wound/cast care after surgical/orthopedic interventions, and recommendations for necessary investigations.

You can find this detailed information on the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor under the "Specialist consultation" section, specifically the paragraph that begins with "For those insured who have a confirmed diagnosis upon leaving the hospital...". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Day hospitalization services in a specialized ambulatory setting are medical services lasting less than 12 hours, combining clinical medical services and investigations, often for diagnostic purposes. Examples include monitoring of pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection of precancerous lesions.

You can find this detailed information on the webpage https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor under the section titled 'What other services can be provided'.
answers.bResponse:
Day hospitalization services in a specialized ambulatory setting are medical services lasting less than 12 hours, combining clinical medical services and investigations, often for diagnostic purposes. Examples include monitoring of pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection of precancerous lesions.

You can find this detailed information on the webpage https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor under the section titled 'What other services can be provided'. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Day hospitalization services include medical services for diagnostic purposes, monitoring of normal and high-risk pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection of precancerous lesions of the breast and dysplastic lesions of the cervix. These services combine clinical medical services and investigations.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "What other services can be provided" for examples of day hospitalization services, and also within the description of the "basic package" of services for diagnostic purposes.
answers.bResponse:
Day hospitalization services include medical services for diagnostic purposes, monitoring of normal and high-risk pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection of precancerous lesions of the breast and dysplastic lesions of the cervix. These services combine clinical medical services and investigations.

To find this information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "What other services can be provided" for examples of day hospitalization services, and also within the description of the "basic package" of services for diagnostic purposes. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
After a consultation, a specialist doctor can recommend therapeutic conduct, prescribe medical and hygienic-dietetic treatment, suggest medical or palliative care at home, and advise on medical devices or assistive technologies. They can also provide clinical and paraclinical assessments, monitor chronic conditions, issue referrals to other specialties, release medical leave certificates, and recommend services from psychologists or physiotherapists.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "Specialist consultation," specifically the paragraphs beginning with "The specialist doctor can decide after consultations" and "Doctors with certain specializations."
answers.bResponse:
After a consultation, a specialist doctor can recommend therapeutic conduct, prescribe medical and hygienic-dietetic treatment, suggest medical or palliative care at home, and advise on medical devices or assistive technologies. They can also provide clinical and paraclinical assessments, monitor chronic conditions, issue referrals to other specialties, release medical leave certificates, and recommend services from psychologists or physiotherapists.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "Specialist consultation," specifically the paragraphs beginning with "The specialist doctor can decide after consultations" and "Doctors with certain specializations." For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Yes, specialist doctors can recommend services from psychologists or physiotherapists, provided the specialized outpatient clinic where the doctor works has qualified staff or a contract with a provider of such services.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "What other services can be provided".
answers.bResponse:
Yes, specialist doctors can recommend services from psychologists or physiotherapists, provided the specialized outpatient clinic where the doctor works has qualified staff or a contract with a provider of such services.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "What other services can be provided". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
A psychologist in a specialized outpatient clinic can provide psychological counseling, psychotherapy, and special psychopedagogical counseling.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and look under the section titled "What other services can be provided".
answers.bResponse:
A psychologist in a specialized outpatient clinic can provide psychological counseling, psychotherapy, and special psychopedagogical counseling.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and look under the section titled "What other services can be provided". For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
A physiotherapist can offer individual or group physiotherapy, including physiotherapy with special devices such as mechanical, electromechanical, or robotic devices. They also provide physical therapy for patients with conditions or aggravations after COVID-19.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section titled "What other services can be provided."
answers.bResponse:
A physiotherapist can offer individual or group physiotherapy, including physiotherapy with special devices such as mechanical, electromechanical, or robotic devices. They also provide physical therapy for patients with conditions or aggravations after COVID-19.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section titled "What other services can be provided." For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer:
Remote options are available for psychological counseling. Remote options for physiotherapy are not explicitly mentioned.

To find this information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section "What other services can be provided".

answers.answer:
Yes, individuals with conditions or aggravations after COVID-19 can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, through the recommendation of doctors from cardiology and pneumology specialties.

To find this detailed information, visit the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and look under the "Specialist consultation" section, towards the end of the page.

answers.answer:
The official source of information regarding these specialized medical services is the “Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system” by the National Health Insurance House.

To find detailed information, go to the website dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read under the section titled "Specialist doctor".
